title: Are you getting sick of not funny role plays?
content: Even Levellord's have ceased to be mildly entertaining.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Explain...
content:
Um... could you explain this one a little better Xtraverse? I didn't understand. Are you talking about RPG's? LL has an RPG? Oh, could you just clarify yourself.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: ehh..
content:
What he's referring to are the little conversations which appear in posts. Something like this:

Xky: I'm making a statement.

LevelLord: I'm making another statement.

Xky: I have a snappy comeback to that statement.

LevelLord: Ker-Zany! Look at the funny!

Stuff like that is... a little tiring after a while. Especially when it's attempted by the masses. It's okay to have one person do it here and there--but as a frequent means of communicating ideas? I agree... they've gotta stop, at least for a while.

title: Re: ehh..
content:
"Um... could you explain this one a little better Xtraverse? I didn't understand. Are you talking about RPG's? LL has an RPG? Oh, could you just clarify yourself."
Yes, LL has an RPG. It's based around sick fetishes and violence. You can read the rules from her web page. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]

I've liked LL's stuff, she's definitely the best in those. But well, I guess you're right that they're too common here..

Edit: It's funny how people've chose then second ketchup![url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: ehh..
content:
I'm rarely annoyed by the kind of comments LL once invented. -----------------
[img]http://jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Rocket.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: ehh..
content: Oh I don't mind if people do them, I'd just rather they be funny and not complete non-seqs.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: ehh..
content:
Well, I guess now is time to insert a funny role play...

On the other hand, if I do then I'll just piss Xtra off...

Unless I do a role play about Xtra getting pissed off...

Which will probbably really piss him off.

On the other hand, people did choose the second ketchup...

Ah what the hell, my evilness commands me.


[quote]Quote:[hr]Xky: Statement!

LL: Reply to statement!

Xtra: Oh no you don't! Leave me out of this![hr][/quote]


There! Happy?

content:
Oh... I understand the question now... but, why the weird anwers.

If I sound dumb, and don't know something which is pretty obvious, please; ridicule me. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: ehh..
content:
Well, ketchup is really tomato sauce, but it's named after kecap (in English I think; ketjap in Dutch), which makes no sense, because that is soj sauce.
So, that's why the answers were about ketchup.
(I voted the 3rd one, saw there were 2 earlier votes for the 2nd after I did, and since, everybody else voted the 2nd option.)Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

content:

title: hehe
content:
Whenever I think of Unfleex, I can't help but remember drawing the Putie for XkyKeen3's end shot. :-) I really liked the Puties.

So, LevelLord, the term for getting married and moving out of the Keen community is "Pulling an Ilsoap" now? Haha...

title: Re: hehe
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Whenever I think of Unfleex, I can't help but remember drawing the Putie for XkyKeen3's end shot. :-) I really liked the Puties.[hr][/quote]

Hehe. I should finally put up some of my Puties picture books, but I honestly can't be bothered anymore. I stopped writing Puties books like 2 years ago... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] God, I was so obsessive then. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

The character that Xky drew in XkyKeen3's end shot wasn't even a Putie, but rather a poorly drawn human character who "tamed" or "trained" other Puties and embarked on adventures with his good friends, Silly the Ghost and... Cat. (who was killed off very quickly and was resurrected later on in the spirit of poking fun at animes and soap operas where characters often die as often as they are resurrected)

Wow, Puties celebrates it's 5th anniversary this month! Yippee! And Silly celebrates his 7th anniversary. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] -- Censorship is F**ked! --

title: Re: hehe
content:
I think we'd all like to see those books, if not for the artwork, if not for the creativity, if not for the insight into your mind, heck if not even for the sheer intrest they've sparked, at least do it because in a few months you'll be too mature to publicly embarass yourself by showing them.

[quote]Quote:[hr]So, LevelLord, the term for getting married and moving out of the Keen community is "Pulling an Ilsoap" now? Haha...[hr][/quote]

Yep. Other terms are:

Shocking: Popping in only to post stupid or offensive material then running away.

Levellording: Suddenly doing something very annoying, such as constantly replying to a topic every few hours, TYPING ALL IN CAPS, misspellling words or posting stupid role plays.

Floaseing: To suddenly pop in and say you're leaving us forever.

I think the term for graduly becomming less and less active should be named after either ek or fleex.

A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Well...
content:
Well, in that case; I guess that's what you could call me:

I've decided to ek... and not post so often. I'll check in every once an a while, but I should really work on my mods, and *gasp* homework!!! Geese. I won't be as active, but come around December, I'll get more active. I've just got to work a bit harder on my school work.

See ya'll now later!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --
